basics.name: Brendan Cazier
basics.label: Mechanical Engineer
basics.summary: I'm a mechanical engineer by education, having spent all of my early career working with  physical problems associated with aircraft maintenance and reliability. Originally I used coding as a hobby and to try to automate various tasks either at work or at home, but I'm now looking to turn that into my profession. I have worked on both long-term, large-scope, campains, as well as high urgency, triage-esque, projects. I enjoy problem solving, and have worked to provide solutions while conscious of labor difficulties, costs, reliability and regulatory requirements, and more.

work.company: SWECO - MI SWACO, A Schlumberger Company
work.summary: SWECO is an American oilfield services manufacturer of industrial filtration devices for seperating solids and fluids.
highlights: Summer Internship, primarily 3D modelling hydraulic parts in Solidworks.
Developed a catalog of realtime, parametrically-generated, 3D models for hydraulic manifold designs (Solidworks)
Worked alongside technicians to create an instrument cabinet system to store manifolds and prototypes.
